resources.string: Cakes are not only for bithday parties. It is also a good dessert after dinner. There are a lot of types of cakes: Strawberry mousse cake, Chocolate, Cheesecake and even Carrot Cake.
Breakfast is a first meal. Traditional breakfast foods include pork sausages or bacon, fried potatoes, eggs, toast, cereals, pancakes and maple syrup, or hot oatmeal.

Lunch is a meal eaten around midday. North Americans generally eat a quick lunch that often includes some type of sandwich, soup, or leftovers from the previous night\'s dinner (e.g., rice or pasta). Children often bring packed lunches to school, which might consist of a sandwich

Dinner often consists of a main entree of meat, chicken, or fish, with side dishes of rice, potato, or pasta and a vegetable or salad. Most people drink water, iced tea, juice, soda, wine, or beer with their evening meal.
